snippet: The chief curator at Tate Modern in London is to join the Metropolitan to raise its profile in contemporary art.
abstract: Sheena Wagstaff, chief curator of Tate Modern since 2001, will oversee a new department devoted to art of the 20th and 21st centuries at the Metropolitan Museum of Art, which hopes to become a serious competitor in the field of contemporary art.
lead_paragraph: The chief curator at Tate Modern in London is to join the Metropolitan to raise its profile in contemporary art.

headline.seo: Met Hires Tate Modern Curator, Gearing Up to Be Major Player in Contemporary Art
headline.main: Met Gears Up to Be a Player in Contemporary Art
headline.print_headline: Met Gears Up to Be a Major Player in Contemporary Art
